Package manito.eft.interfaces.giftcard

Interface GiftCardProviderInterface

  • public interface GiftCardProviderInterface
    Gift card message builder/constructor. Implement this interface to allow building of specific message for each gift card provider.

    Created:

    09/02/2017 / 14:04

    Version:
    $Revision: $ $Date: $ $Author: $
    Author:
    Ian D Williams

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String buildGiftCardActivateAndLoadMsg​(EPSRequest request, String posTransactionNumber)
      To issue a value on customer-valued cards.
      String buildGiftCardActivateMsg​(EPSRequest request, String posTransactionNumber)
      To activate pre-valued cards.

      To cancel an "Issue" or "Activate" transaction.

      Reverses "Load" transaction.
      String buildGiftCardRedeemMsg​(EPSRequest request, String posTransactionNumber)
      To debit a card when merchandise is purchased.
      String buildGiftCardRedeemReversalMsg​(EPSRequest request, String posTransactionNumber)

      Reverses close account message.

      To close the currently open batch and reset the batch totals.
      String buildReconciliationWithoutClosureMsg​(EPSRequest request, String posTransactionNumber)
      Retrieves the totals for the currently open batch.

                                String posTransactionNumber)

        posTransactionNumber - the posTransactionNumber

      • buildGiftCardActivateMsg

        String buildGiftCardActivateMsg​(EPSRequest request,
                                String posTransactionNumber)
        To activate pre-valued cards. Cards have a designated value in the banks system and are shipped inactive. When the customer purchases the card, the activate transaction changes the status in the banks database from inactive to active. This value is also used to activate new virtual gift cards.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        posTransactionNumber - the posTransactionNumber
        Returns:
        String

      • buildGiftCardActivateReversalMsg

        String buildGiftCardActivateReversalMsg​(EPSRequest request,
                                        String posTransactionNumber)
        To cancel an "Issue" or "Activate" transaction.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        posTransactionNumber - the posTransactionNumber
        Returns:
        String

      • buildGiftCardActivateAndLoadMsg

        String buildGiftCardActivateAndLoadMsg​(EPSRequest request,
                                       String posTransactionNumber)
        To issue a value on customer-valued cards. The cards are shipped activated and the "issue" transaction places a designed value on the card.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        posTransactionNumber - the posTransactionNumber
        Returns:
        String

      • buildGiftCardStopMsg

        String buildGiftCardStopMsg​(EPSRequest request,
                            String posTransactionNumber)
        To deactivate an account or card, even if there is still money on the card. This flag is only for administrators and only used in case of fraud.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        posTransactionNumber - the posTransactionNumber
        Returns:
        String

      • buildGiftCardStopReversalMsg

                                    String posTransactionNumber)
        Reverses close account message.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        posTransactionNumber - the posTransactionNumber
        Returns:
        String
